question:
Consider the following statements about the Doing Business (DB) Report, 2018:
  1. As per Report, India ranks 100 among 190 countries
  2. Indiaâ€™s improvement is best this year among the South Asia and BRICS economies
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Recently, the World Bank today released the Doing Business (DB) Report, 2018. As per report India ranks 100 among 190 countries assessed. India has leapt 30 ranks over its rank of 130 in the Doing Business Report 2017. The DB Report is an assessment of 190 economies and covers 10 indicators which span the lifecycle of a business. As per the report, India is the only country in South Asia and BRICS economies to feature among most improved economies of the DB Report this year. The report covers 10 indicators out of which India has improved its rank in 6 indicators.
